Battle Cards
View On FortressMaximus.io

Combat Training

  1. What battle cards are in the Metroplex Pack?
    3 x Armored Plating
    3 x Backup Plan
    2 x Combat Training
    2 x Data Pad
    3 x Flamethrower
    3 x Force Field
    3 x Handheld Blaster
    3 x Height Advantage
    3 x Improvised Shield
    3 x Inspiring Leadership
    3 x Protected By Metroplex
    3 x Rally the City
    3 x Rapid Conversion
    3 x Supercharge
  2. If Dreadwing is equipped with Combat Training and 2 weapons and/or armors, does Combat Training give Dreadwing bold/tough 2 since he has 2 weapons/armors? Same question can be asked for Predaking; Does he get Bold 5 if he has 5 weapons and combat training?
    No. A single Combat Training gives Bold/Tough 1 at most.
